about_the_game:
The guests at Sky Resort are buzzing with excitement, their bodies and desires pulsing with anticipation, eager to take the fun to the next level!

Dive headfirst into a world where pleasure knows no limits, following their steamy, lustful adventures. At Sky Resort, the heat never cools, the sex never fades, and the naughty times are only just beginning. From passionate encounters under the stars to intimate moments behind closed doors, every fantasy finds its release in this haven of untamed desire!

Sky Resort 3 is the third installment in a series of kinetic eroge, offering an immersive visual novel experience with high-quality 3D art that will cater to your kinks.

If you're into Cum Inflation, Futanari Sex, and Large Insertions, this is the perfect game for you!

A wild girl who's become the embodiment of lust! All she cares about is finding her next hung partner.

Having a girlfriend has never been an issue for her!

Scarlett is far from being tamed! She has yet to meet a dominant woman capable of piping her into submission.

She's a tough nut to crack and will put up a fight with whoever is fortunate enough to lay down with her.

Do you think you have what it takes to bring her under your heels?

After meeting one of the lewdest girls staying at the hotel, Veronica has embraced her wilder side, ready and willing to carry on with the party she started.

Come join her and her fling! The more, the merrier.

Even the law’s finest needs a break. Samantha, a confident and striking police officer, takes some time off after a tough case, checking into the hotel to unwind. There, she encounters Selena, the seductive receptionist.

Their intense chemistry is undeniable how long before sparks ignite into passion?

A powerhouse in every sense of the word! Raven is a bodybuilder competing in a prestigious championship that'll get her career into stardom.

Wouldn't it be a pity if she were to meet someone who'd distract her from achieving her goals?

Delphi's girlfriend returns to the hotel at last! Enticed by her partner and her lovers, Jessy races to the resort, where Selena warmly greets her with open arms (and no panties).

Meeting an old friend is a good reason to celebrate no matter the location!

◆ Features

◇ An erotic story around 50k+ words long (from 3 to 4 hours of gameplay)

◇ Many lewd scenes that will ignite your senses (and make you play with one hand)

◇ Seven steamy girls that grow hornier every day

◇ 4k high-quality graphics

◇ 400+ unique CGs

◇ 50+ fully animated erotic scenes

◇ Detailed 3D backgrounds with multiple variations

◇ Image gallery, music room, and replay scene functionality

◇ Achievements, Easter eggs, and more!

content_descriptors.notes:
This is an ADULT game meant to be played by a mature audience only.

It includes explicit, sexual material that some viewers may find offensive.

The story contains:
◇ Futanari on Futanari sexual acts
◇ Futanari on Female sexual acts
◇ Female on Female sexual acts
◇ Public Sex
◇ Kissing
◇ Cum Inflation
◇ Large Insertions
◇ Crude language

The characters depicted and shown in the game are over 18 years old.

name: Sky Resort 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Step into the shoes of the manager at Sky's Resort, the kinkiest getaway on Earth! In this adult visual novel, cater to your guests’ desires, explore their fetishes, and ensure their stay is unforgettable. A steamy vacation full of passion and adventure awaits!
